424240.name: SodaCity - Original Soundtrack
424240.description:
SodaCity's complete original soundtrack.

A 25 track progressive rock album composed for the game.
In mp3 and FLAC.

Track list:
1. SodaCity
2. Arcade
3. Bar
4. Tragic Night
5. Streets
6. Can Can Club
7. ESE's Flat
8. Boss Fight
9. Outside the Dragon
10. Eastern Dragon Casino
11. Second Floor
12. Little D'Bob's Construction
13. Unfinished Lobby
14. Half-Built Floor
15. Barely Constructed Roof
16. Factory Assault
17. M's Laboratory
18. Escape
19. Canhunt
20. Vincent Warm Up
21. Outside the Plaza
22. Elevator
23. Helipad
24. Villa
25. End Fight

Music by Rodrigo Flores.
You can listen more stuff at:

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
